text: When attempting to configure apache tomcat 1.2.33 in Windows Server 2008 R2 Enterprise with IIS 7.5 continue to receive error message isapi filter failed to load. I followed the instructions on the Apache isapi redirector page however I continue to receive the same results. I contacted Microsoft support and was informed that the dll is old and is not supported. I would greatly appreciate anyones help in resolving this matter.
creator: moblack29@yahoo.com
